topicTitle: Admin Abuse (Josh Josh) (didnt no where this goes)

posts.postText:
i was on darks ttt server on richland tonight and i get killed by josh josh after my last words were that he killed me he made a vote asking wheter he was traitor it went: Is Josh Josh a traitor?
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            1. nope
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            2. no

im new so i didnt no what to do so i posted it here; this is my proof of his abuse of the !vote admin abbility.
     
(LAST WORDS) |NNJG| Sandvich: [NNJG] JoshJosh is the traitor!
Rdm is killing without reason or just being plain stupid. ~ MOTD
Deadhawk12: Yes.
Deadhawk12: lets kill im
[NNJG] JoshJosh: no im not                                     (Vote starts)
dP | C to the UNIT voted for: nope
[NNJG] JoshJosh voted for: no
Tydrel voted for: nope
[NNJG]OhDannyBoy voted for: nope
Deadhawk12 voted for: nope
*DEAD* (TEAM) |NNJG| Sandvich: dont vote
Black Elf voted for: no
*DEAD* (TEAM) |NNJG| Sandvich: josh josh made it
Deadhawk12: SNIPER NOR SNIPING
Deadhawk12: wat
Vote results: Option ''nope'' won. (4/10)


plz post whether or not i:
posted in the right place & 
do i need more proof or is this enough.



thank you for reading this 


- Sandvich

Thats not proof, you could have easily edited that. You should have taken a screenshot

 *Kryzoid's Edit* 
@Sandvich: These links might also be helpful to read up on first.
http://nonerdsjustgeeks.com/forum/viewtopic.php?f=15&t=936
http://nonerdsjustgeeks.com/forum/viewtopic.php?f=15&t=6 (The Proof Section)
plus, unless i am mistaken or some things have changed in my absence, dark's server isn't technically part of NNJG yet.

>> plus, unless i am mistaken or some things have changed in my absence, dark's server isn't technically part of NNJG yet. 


For half a second I thought you didn't post-whore when you edited Pharaoh's post.... I guess not.

Anyways, you HAVE to take screenshots if you want a successful ban request. You can take one by pressing F5 or binding a key to "jpeg"

I have mine binded to J (j for jpeg, trolol), it's a good key.

First of all, I don't remember doing that. Second, that vote doesn't affect anything at all. Obviously if your last words were "JoshJosh is traitor" then people would try to kill me. This vote is the equivalent of saying in chat "I'm not a traitor" which is just a lie, and nobody would really believe it. And IIRC I was killed anyway.
